description: Grants permission to create a new case.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: Required element used in combination with CreateCase. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: resolverType
parameters.description: Required element used in combination with CreateCase to identify the resolver type. Available resolvers include self-supported | aws-supported.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Required element used in combination with CreateCase to provide a title for the new case.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Required element used in combination with CreateCase to provide a description for the new case.

parameters.name: engagementType
parameters.description: Required element used in combination with CreateCase to provide an engagement type for the new cases. Available engagement types include Security Incident | Investigation.

parameters.name: reportedIncidentStartDate
parameters.description: Required element used in combination with CreateCase to provide an initial start date for the unauthorized activity.

parameters.name: impactedAccounts
parameters.description: Required element used in combination with CreateCase to provide a list of impacted accounts. (string) ---

parameters.name: watchers
parameters.description: Required element used in combination with CreateCase to provide a list of entities to receive notifications for case updates. (dict) --- name (string) --- jobTitle (string) ---

parameters.name: threatActorIpAddresses
parameters.description: An optional element used in combination with CreateCase to provide a list of suspicious internet protocol addresses associated with unauthorized activity. (dict) --- userAgent (string) ---

parameters.name: impactedServices
parameters.description: An optional element used in combination with CreateCase to provide a list of services impacted. (string) ---

parameters.name: impactedAwsRegions
parameters.description: An optional element used in combination with CreateCase to provide a list of impacted regions. (dict) ---

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: An optional element used in combination with CreateCase to add customer specified tags to a case. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: caseId
nested_items.description: A response element providing responses for requests to CreateCase. This element responds with the case ID.
